entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-x86` pipeline failing on OSX x64 #80403
  • Default IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch to true for CoreCLR #80398
  • MacOS: Switch to PersistKeySet on X509Certificate2Collection.Import() causes failure on MacOS (Windows and Linux work fine) #80396
  • CoreCLR runtime seems to have a subtle bug in HFA flag calculation #80393
    8.0.0
  • Cloud Native: Improve Startup and workingset for Trimmed WebApp #80388
    8.0.0
  • Self-contained application not starting on ARM64 & Amazon Linux 2 #80404
  • Improve FrozenDictionary/Set code coverage #80378
    8.0.0
  • How to resolve IL2026? #80374
  • Design and implement robust testing story for single-file #80369
    8.0.0
  • Extract interface IReadOnlyStream in System.IO.Stream #80368
  • debugger step into conditional branch when portable pdb generated from cil manually and using line attribute #80367
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Ascii.ToUtf16 overload that treats `\0` as invalid #80366
  • Undue restrictions on adding types with System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.MetadataBuilder #80360
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\LoopAlignment\\LoopsToProcess\\LoopsToProcess.cmd #80358
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #80357
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrashMainThread/ParallelCrashMainThread.sh #80356
  • Xamarin.Android 支持 System.IO.Ports #80352

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] We should be able to hijack in funclets #72343
    Future
  • Aes-Gcm tags should support other sizes than 16 on macOS #80329
  • Crash when running a csc compiled program in mono VM #80342
  • Possible performance issue using Vector<Double> from stack allocated Span #80385
  • NET 7: Calling `GC.Collect()` causes Access Violation exception (cx0000005) #79486
    8.0.0
  • Add ability to disable reflection emit for testing #39806
    Future
  • .net462 httpClient does not seem to listen to cancellation token. #80370
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails to deserialize init-only & required properties #58770
    8.0.0
  • FileInfo.Createtime seem to be wrong (.Net 6 on Linux) #80023
  • Analyzer Proposal: Recommend use of concrete types to maximize devirtualization potential #51193
    8.0.0
  • [UWP] Cryptography.ProtectedData version 7.0 => System.PlatformNotSupportedException #78875
    7.0.x
  • System.InvalidCastException: Arg_InvalidCastException after upgrading blazor webassembly from .net 6 to .net 7 #78864
  • HttpClient becomes very slow and cancel request after migrating to NET 7 #79443
  • Can't add typed HttpClient for BackgroundService #80303
  • Console.WriteLine() skips newline if line length matches default console width #80373
  • JIT output for various empty string test methods extremely suboptimal #63201
    Future
  • JIT: Invalid isSimdAsHWIntrinsic param passed in lclmorph #80239
    8.0.0
  • add SslStreamCertificateContext to SslClientAuthenticationOptions #71194
    8.0.0
  • [LSG] Objects logging using @ operator in logging source generator attribute #78013
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build tools subset to generate artifacts #80406
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2083765 #80405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [workloads] Add Current to the name of the workload manifest #80401
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Reserve memory for FOH in-range" #80400
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move a regression test out of CI #80399
  • Update Libraries Feature Switches for DynamicCodeSupport #80397
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, linkable-framework
  • Add tests for frozen collections #80395
    area-System.Collections
  • Remove check for assembly name in p/invoke library load #80394
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Backport to 7.0 of 80302 that fixes #79486 #80392
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Reverting wrong commit changing the helloworld sample #80390
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove Substrings from PhoneAttribute #80389
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Remove Substring from EventSource.InitializeProviderMetadata #80386
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Remove some string allocation from NormalizeServiceName #80384
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename some BinaryPrimitives files (and move some functions) #80381
  • Add ability statically link OpenSSL #80380
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add public RefSafetyRulesAttribute #80379
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use CompressionLevel.SmallestSize in Bundler #80372
    area-HostModel
  • Feature/logging messagetemplate compat #80364
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • AOT: Handle printing names of generic parameter types #80371
  • [release/7.0] Fix pGeneratedNewStub determination #80269
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.3
  • Add a debug only config knob to control the maximum force inline depth #80349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HFA detection in Crossgen2 #80218
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Updated type of heap_segment_survived from int to size_t to facilitate survival >= 2GB. #80302
    area-GC-coreclr
  • remove draft UUID section superseded by RFC 4122 #80377
    area-Setup
  • Add IsDynamicCodeSupported Feature Switch #80246
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • perfcollect docs: run two commands instead of three #76325
    documentation, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report more accurately when loop unrolling changes the IR #80310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • retrieve method symbol only once in logging source gen parser #80365
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80188
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #80209
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.14
  • [release/6.0][Android] Fix SslStream on legacy Android API levels #79277
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 6.0.14
  • Add more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • Use PackedIndexOfIsSupported checks in more places #80254
  • JIT: Fall back to a canonical SIMD handle in gtGetStructHandleForSimdOrHW #80240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix purity of CORINFO_HELP_GETREFANY on win-x64 #80292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ClientCertificateContext #80182
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2082819 #80322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Create analyzer in ComInterfaceGenerator to enforce the generator is used with IUnknown only #78189
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Change github illink links #80407
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix a few profiler related issues associated with frozen objects #79563
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Don't use IlcPath in NativeAOT targets #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add a bitset with IL jump targets #80136
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Report FOH segments #79985
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Remove RequiresDynamicCode from Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #79425
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/7.0] [browser] make dynamic import cancelable #80312
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • measure the perf impact of deduplicating IsCompleted call in GetConsumingEnumerable #78887
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Restore Advance when reading float/double with XmlBufferReader. #80321
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 7.0.x
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] optimize out 'is this method MulticastDelegate.Invoke' checks in aot->interp transitions #80181
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Refactoring store liveness update #79724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consistently use fgMakeMultiUse in the gtNewSimd*Node APIs #80242
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a pass of early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision for implicit byrefs #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Removing console.debug message helper to make debugger work. #72812
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixed array delete in debugger.cpp #79638
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix parsing the output of `ping` on Samsung phones #80133
    area-System.Net
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix crash when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is passed non delegate type #79744
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce the number of forced `MethodTable`s #79594
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Equalize committed space in free regions and move regions to global free list #77597
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #79386
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove System.Security.Permissions from S.C.CM. #80347
    area-System.Configuration, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix most violations of new CA1859 #80335
    area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Workflow fixes #2160

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to April 22 #2158
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: dispatch #2145

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet.exe steals -d option from dotnet-* tools starting in .NET 6 #29839
  • .net6 WPF Hot Reload not working #29832
  • I have errors when I do MAUI on visual studio #29824

Closed

  • [NetSDKE2E][Regression]With .Net 8 SDK installed, the single-file app run failed on Mac with error "Unable to load shared library..." #29823
  • Razor task ran into copy failure. #29289
  • Wrong chinese translation for NETSDK1125 #17100
    Backlog
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With .Net 8 SDK installed in Chinese OS, the texts should not contain “Core” string when building the project. #29615
  • System.TypeLoadException when running a simple specific code #29819

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29838
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29837
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29836
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29835
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add DynamicCodeSupport Feature Switch #29785
  • Trusted Roots: 2022-11 CTL #29829
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (7.0.1xx backport) #29584
    Servicing-approved, Area-Tools, 7.0.3
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.1xx backport) #29579
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.3xx. backport) #29583
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29810
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2083062 #29747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update eol list #29818
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use File.OpenRead when loading tool configuration (6.0.4xx backport) #29548
    Servicing-consider, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Adding Microsoft.AspNetCore.EnsureJsonTrimmability host configuration #29719
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix bad merge that incorrectly didn't exclude some packages #29435
    Area-NetSDK
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary sources from the test used nuget.config file to reduce 429s #29372
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages & Change Culture For All Based on OS Main Language #29755
    Area-Infrastructure

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warnings raised by incremental source generators are not disabled by the SuppressMessage attribute #66337
  • tools : options :Text Editor : C# : Code Style : Formatting :Spacing: Spacing for brackets not working #66336
  • Distinguish classification between built-in types, boolean values and other keywords #66331
  • Suggestion: Allow auto-generated Enum.IsDefined parameter checks, similar to the current "Add null check" for reference types #66327
    Backlog
  • Document.GetOptionsAsync returns wrong TabSize for VB document #66325
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator never runs comparisons on output values #66324
  • Honor Microsoft.FSharp.Core.AutoOpenAttribute in C# #66321
  • Code Cleanup / IDE0032 causes errors in partial classes with manual properties #66320
  • Missing suggestions after `file` keyword #66319
    17.6

Closed

  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from SymbolFinder while using "change namespace to match folder structure" refactoring #59901
    17.3
  • Weird the compiler doesn't stop you from doing this. #66330
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from InlineHintsTagger.GetTags #63204
    Backlog
  • Fresh clone gold bar: "Current solution contains incorrect configurations mappings" #66315
  • `SyntaxGenerator` swaps `protected internal` modifier #66295
  • DebugType does not default to "none" for Release configuration #66103
    17.6
  • how can I use assembly as analyzer? #66153
    Backlog
  • InvalidCastException when using an invalid MetadataReference #11581
    Compiler.Next
  • Unable to reference netmodule #65499
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve VS settings integration test, fix deserialization of enum options from registry #66335
    Area-IDE
  • Report telemetry event with LSP server capabilities #66334
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Refactor GetCapturedParameters method into reusable and parameter specific classes. #66332
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Remove incorrect guids #66333
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66304
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Fix 'protected internal' accessibility modifier keyword order #66296
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Do not copy nullable value type receiver of a constrained call. #66311
    Area-Compilers
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Disallow more locals of restricted type in async methods #66264
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Add `ExternalAccess.RazorCompiler` project with host outputs API #65831
    Area-Compilers
  • Different behaviour of discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Simplify and fix handing of references not yet added #66303
    Area-IDE
  • Allow specifying expected IL verification baseline #66316
    Area-Compilers
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2083694 #66287
  • Added table of content to source-generators.cookbook.md #66317
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Adjust assert to account for error scenarios #66202
    Area-Compilers
  • Doc relationship between GetUsedAssemblyReferences and DocumentationMode #66284
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Implemented `Make property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support task list priorities in LSP #66294
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64214
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Improve logging of rude edits and write analysis log to disk #66318
    Area-Interactive

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Circuit Disposal Before DotNetInvoke Causes Unhandled NullReferenceException #45980
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf regression: json, stage1vanilla #45975
  • Perf improvement: json #45974
  • Update RepoTasks to use the FrameworkReference workaround from GenerateFiles #45973
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Asp.Versioning Libraries do not add Minimal API version to IApiVersionDescriptionProvider #45972
  • Blazor page is rendered before external JavaScript files are loaded #45970
  • Prerendered textarea elements don't have any initial value #45967
    .NET 8 Planning
  • StringUtilities based on vectorized helpers provided by core libraries #45962
  • Request: SetGlobalKey in Blazor #45961
    Backlog
  • CSS Isolation tags mismatch #45958
  • Duplicate SegmentWriteStream #45957
    .NET 8 Planning
  • `string[]` bound to querystring in minimal API should return `400` when not present #45956
  • Apreciation for the empty templates that are now offered for blzor #45955

Closed

  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly support to model binding & routing #34591
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor server Annotation Validators C# Error Message #45638
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #45848
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #45947
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #45948
  • Adding Http(Request/Response) extension methods overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #45568
    8.0-preview1
  • [Identity] TOTP are not one time #45969
  • Passing options to UseStaticFiles breaks Blazor Server's static file service #19578
    8.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Added list item gets nested elements from other list item #45919

PullRequests

Created

  • Update sourceIndexPackageVersion #45982
    area-infrastructure
  • Unskip Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.HttpSys.Microbenchmarks #45981
    area-runtime
  • Update templates to 8.0 #45979
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/WebAssembly.Authentication/src/Interop #45978
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/Components/WebAssembly/Authentication.Msal/src/Interop #45977
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/common #45966
    area-signalr, * NO MERGE *, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Enable throw helper analyzers #45954

Merged

  • Update to net8.0 SDK #45879
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Kestrel transports to solution filters #45933
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `4aecfd1` to `af74f44` #45959
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `71140c3` to `9345421` #45960
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fixed bug - Passing options to UseStaticFiles breaks Blazor Server #45897
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Add infrastructure for RequestDelegateGenerator #45924
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding untyped JsonTypeInfo overloads #45593
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Using `JsonTypeInfo` to read request body in RDF #45932
    area-web-frameworks
  • Adding EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `CarouselView` on iOS behaves incorrectly when bound to a collection of `enum` values #12532
  • MoveToRegion exception #12527
  • It's currently not possible to easily replace the platform view for anything that inherits from ContentView #12526
  • ScrollView doesn't constrain itself to a VerticalStackLayout parent whereas it does when the parent is a Grid #12523
  • iOS Release builds stopped working after last update #12519
  • SwitchCells on Android behave like they have a OneTime Binding #12516
    Backlog
  • Android Crash ImageSource Glyph #12513
    Backlog
  • Drag & drop between two windows of a single application #12510
    Backlog
  • Custom Renderers (iOS) not working in .Net MAUI. #12509
  • Poor performance in debug mode under iOS and Android #12508
  • [Windows][MacOS?] Change title bar color when switching light/dark theme at runtime #12507
    Backlog
  • Add Documentation to Sign and Upload Mac Catalyst to AppStore #12504

Closed

  • VisualStudio Maui templates not working in release #12515
  • Displaying badge on shell tabbar icon #12525
  • OData.Client throws ArgumentException #12474
  • Maui Mac OS Ventura Development identifing my App as Malware #12337

    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider

Merged

  • Fixed a typo on the Display Info Width documentation #12517
    area/docs 📓, community ✨
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.1.0 to 5.1.1 #12466
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12486

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914

  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
